name: Blown Clear
Lore: 'Vader was nearly killed when Han damaged his TIE fighter during a surprise attack in the Death Star trench.',
Text: 'Deploy on your side of table. During a battle, you may place out of playfrom hand a copy of any unique (•) card participating in that battle to reduce attrition against you by that card''s forfeit value. (Immune to Alter while you occupy a battleground.)',
